dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The dollar exchange rate in Kazakhstan settled at 515.03 tenge on April 25th.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's actually down by, uh, more than two tenge from the previous session, right?

The official exchange rate set by the National Bank of Kazakhstan for April 25 is 517.16 tenge per dollar.

dialogue_turns.text: And in Almaty, the average buying rate at exchange offices was super close—515.08 tenge.
